text: Ra yadagara jaba hamile unala'i adesa diyaum ki timiharu tyasa bastima ga'i basa ra yasama jahambata cahanchau kha'u, ra mukhale bhandai janu ki tauba (pascatapa) cha ra dhokama nihuri'era pravesa gara, hamile timra trutiharula'i ksama garidinechaum, ra hamile sukarmiharula'i badhi pani dinechaum
